info.title: Tolar JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard interface for Tolar clients.

methods.name: account_create
methods.description: Creates new keystore.

params.name: master_password
params.description: Locks entire keystore with this password if provided, if empty, keystore will not be locked.

params.name: mnemonic
params.description: 12 words mnemonic used to initialize BIP39 deterministic key generation. If empty string is sent random mnemonic is generated.

result.name: Is account created
result.description: True if account was successfully created, else false.

params.name: mnemonic
params.value: siege van edit river asset always material powder swallow glad helmet wait

methods.name: account_open
methods.description: Opens existing keystore.

params.name: master_password
params.description: Unlocks keystore with this password if keystore was originally locked with the provided password.

result.name: Is account opened
result.description: True if account was successfully created, else false.

params.name: mnemonic
params.value: siege van edit river asset always material powder swallow glad helmet wait

methods.name: account_listAddresses
methods.description: List all addresses in keystore attached to master or thin node.

result.name: Listed addresses
result.description: All addresses in keystore.

items.title: Hex encoded address
items.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

methods.name: account_verifyAddress
methods.description: Verifies if provided address string is in valid Tolar address format.

params.name: address
params.description: Address in hex string format.

result.name: Is address valid
result.description: True if address is in valid tolar format, else false.

methods.name: account_createNewAddress
methods.description: Creates new address in keystore.

params.name: name
params.description: Address description name.

params.name: lock_password
params.description: Password to protect generate keypair for newly created address.

params.name: lock_hint
params.description: Optional password hint for the selected password.

result.name: Created address
result.description: Newly created address.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

methods.name: account_exportKeyFile
methods.description: Exports key file for selected address from keystore.

params.name: address
params.description: Selected address for which export keypair information is required.

result.name: Exported key file
result.description: If successful, return key file in encrypted json format.

examples.name: Export key file example
examples.description: Exports key file in encrypted json format for given address.

methods.name: account_importKeyFile
methods.description: Imports key file to keystore.

params.name: json_key_file
params.description: Key file in encrypted JSON format.

params.name: name
params.description: Name for imported address.

params.name: lock_password
params.description: Lock password if original key file was password protected.

params.name: lock_hint
params.description: Optional lock hint for lock password.

result.name: Imported key file status
result.description: Returns true if import succeeded, else false.

methods.name: account_importRawPrivateKey
methods.description: Imports raw private key to keystore.

params.name: raw_private_key
params.description: Raw private key, should be 64 hex chars long

params.name: name
params.description: Name for imported address.

params.name: lock_password
params.description: Lock password if original key file was password protected.

params.name: lock_hint
params.description: Optional lock hint for lock password.

result.name: Imported raw private key status
result.description: Returns true if import succeeded, else false.

result.name: Import raw private key example result

methods.name: account_listBalancePerAddress
methods.description: List all addresses stored in keystore with their associated name and current balance status.

result.name: Balance per addresses
result.description: Array of addresses paired with their name and balance.

address.title: Address
address.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

examples.name: List balance per address example
examples.description: Lists all addresses in keystore with its balances.

result.name: List balance per address example result

methods.name: account_changePassword
methods.description: Changes master password used to lock entire keystore.

params.name: old_master_password
params.description: The current master password used to lock keystore.

params.name: new_master_password
params.description: The new master password that will replace the current one.

result.name: Is password changed
result.description: True if password change was successful, false otherwise.

methods.name: account_changeAddressPassword
methods.description: Changes lock password for the single address used to lock its private key in keystore.

params.name: address
params.description: Address for which password changing is required.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

params.name: old_password
params.description: Current address password.

params.name: new_password
params.description: New address password that will replace the current one.

result.name: Is address password changed
result.description: True if address password change was successful, false otherwise.

methods.name: account_sendRawTransaction
methods.description: Creates transaction from data given in request parameters. Verify and sign the transaction using keystore and then sends the transaction to the master node where it will be executed.

schema.title: Sender address
schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

schema.title: Receiver address
schema.description: The address that received this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to send.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

params.name: sender_address_password
params.description: The password to unlock private key for sender address, empty if address is not locked.

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price
schema.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

params.name: data
params.description: Smart contract bytecode in hex format.

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

result.name: Transaction hash
result.description: Hash of created transaction that can be used to obtain information about created transaction.

methods.name: account_sendFundTransferTransaction
methods.description: Sends data for creating a transaction if sender address private key is stored in keystore. The transaction used for transferring funds from the sender to the receiver address.

schema.title: Sender address
schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

schema.title: Receiver address
schema.description: The address that received this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to send.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

params.name: sender_address_password
params.description: The password to unlock private key for sender address, empty if address is not locked.

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price
schema.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

result.name: Transaction hash
result.description: Hash of created transaction that can be used to obtain information about created transaction.

result.name: Send fund transfer transaction example result

methods.description: Sends data for creating a transaction if sender address private key is stored in keystore.The transaction used for deploying the contract.

schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to send.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

params.name: sender_address_password
params.description: The password to unlock private key for sender address, empty if address is not locked.

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price

params.name: data

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

result.name: Transaction hash

result.name: Send deploy contract transaction example result

methods.name: account_sendExecuteFunctionTransaction
methods.description: Sends data for creating a transaction if sender address private key is stored in keystore. The transaction is used for executing contract functions.

schema.title: Sender address
schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

schema.title: Receiver address
schema.description: The address that received this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to send.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

params.name: sender_address_password
params.description: The password to unlock private key for sender address, empty if address is not locked.

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price
schema.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

params.name: data
params.description: Smart contract bytecode in hex format.

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

result.name: Transaction hash
result.description: Hash of created transaction that can be used to obtain information about created transaction.

result.name: Send execute function transaction example result

methods.name: tol_getBlockCount
methods.description: Returns total number of block in blockchain.

result.name: Block count
result.description: Total number of blocks in blockchain.

methods.name: tol_getLatestBlock
methods.description: Retrieves latest block from the blockchain.

result.name: Latest block
result.description: Last block in blockchain.

block_index.title: Block index
block_index.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

confirmation_timestamp.title: Confirmation timestamp
confirmation_timestamp.description: The time when the block was confirmed.

previous_block_hash.title: Previous block hash
previous_block_hash.description: Block hash for the previous block in blockchain attached to this block.

transaction_hashes.title: Transaction hashes
transaction_hashes.description: An array of transaction hashes contained in this block.

methods.name: tol_getBlockByHash
methods.description: Returns block by its hash.

params.name: block_hash
params.description: Hash of the block.

result.name: Block by hash
result.description: Block corresponding given hash.

block_index.title: Block index
block_index.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

confirmation_timestamp.title: Confirmation timestamp
confirmation_timestamp.description: The time when the block was confirmed.

previous_block_hash.title: Previous block hash
previous_block_hash.description: Block hash for the previous block in blockchain attached to this block.

transaction_hashes.title: Transaction hashes
transaction_hashes.description: An array of transaction hashes contained in this block.

result.name: Get block by hash example result

methods.name: tol_getBlockByIndex
methods.description: Returns block by its index.

params.name: block_index
params.description: Index of required block.

schema.title: Block index
schema.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

result.name: Get block by index
result.description: Block corresponding given index.

block_index.title: Block index
block_index.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

confirmation_timestamp.title: Confirmation timestamp
confirmation_timestamp.description: The time when the block was confirmed.

previous_block_hash.title: Previous block hash
previous_block_hash.description: Block hash for the previous block in blockchain attached to this block.

transaction_hashes.title: Transaction hashes
transaction_hashes.description: An array of transaction hashes contained in this block.

result.name: Get block by index example result

methods.name: tol_getGasEstimate
methods.description: Executes given transaction and returns amount of used gas. After execution transaction is reverted.

schema.title: Sender address
schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

schema.title: Receiver address
schema.description: The address that received this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to be sent.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price
schema.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

params.name: data
params.description: Smart contract bytecode in hex format.

params.name: nonce
params.description: Transaction nonce.

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

result.name: Gas estimate
result.description: Gas estimate.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

methods.name: tol_tryCallTransaction
methods.description: Executes read only contract functions on evm without spending gas or having any effect to address balance and nonce.

schema.title: Sender address
schema.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

schema.title: Receiver address
schema.description: The address that received this transaction.

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of atto tolars to be sent.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

schema.title: Gas
schema.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

schema.title: Gas price
schema.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

params.name: data
params.description: Smart contract bytecode in hex format.

params.name: nonce
params.description: Transaction nonce.

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

params.name: network_id
params.description: Transaction nonce.

schema.title: Network id
schema.description: Unique network identifier on which transaction is valid on. (i.e. mainnet = 1, testnet = 3, staging = 4 ...).

output.title: Output
output.description: The returned data of the call, e.g. a smart contract functions return value.

excepted.title: Excepted
excepted.description: True if exception happened, false if transaction execution was successful.

methods.name: tol_getBalance
methods.description: Get balance for selected address on the specified block in the blockchain.

params.name: address
params.description: Address for which balance is needed.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

params.name: block_index
params.description: Index of block for which balance is required.

schema.title: Block index
schema.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

result.name: Balance
result.description: Balance for given address at block with specified index.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

result.name: Get balance example result
result.description: Required address have 1 Tolar = 1000000000000000000 attoTolar

methods.name: tol_getLatestBalance
methods.description: Returns current balance for given address on last block in blockchain.

params.name: address
params.description: Address for which balance is needed.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

result.name: Get latest balance
result.description: Latest balance for given address.

schema.title: Atto Tolar
schema.description: Smallest available amount of tolar. 1 attoTolar = 0.000000000000000001 Tol

result.name: Get latest balance example result
result.description: Required address have 1 Tolar = 1000000000000000000 attoTolar

methods.name: tol_getNonce
methods.description: Returns next available nonce value for given address.

params.name: address
params.description: Address for which next nonce is needed.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

result.name: Next nonce
result.description: Next nonce for given address.

schema.title: Nonce
schema.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

methods.name: tol_getBlockchainInfo
methods.description: Retrieves blockchain statistics information.

result.name: Blockchain info
result.description: Provides basic information about blockchain.

confirmed_blocks_count.title: Confirmed blocks count
confirmed_blocks_count.description: Total number of blocks in the current blockchain.

total_blocks_count.title: Total blocks count
total_blocks_count.description: Total number of blocks in the current blockchain.

last_confirmed_block_hash.title: Total blocks count
last_confirmed_block_hash.description: Hash of latest block in blockchain.

methods.name: tol_getTransaction
methods.description: Retrieves confirmed transaction information from the current node blockchain.

params.name: transaction_hash
params.description: The hash for the requested transaction.

result.name: Transaction
result.description: Requested transaction.

block_hash.title: Block hash
block_hash.description: Hash of block where this transaction is found.

transaction_index.title: Transaction index
transaction_index.description: Index of transaction inside a block.

sender_address.title: Sender address
sender_address.description: The address that initiated this transaction.

receiver_address.title: Receiver address
receiver_address.description: The address that received this transaction.

gas.title: Gas
gas.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

gas_price.title: Gas price
gas_price.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

data.title: Data
data.description: Smart contract bytecode. Not in hex format, transform hex bytecode to bytes.

nonce.title: Nonce
nonce.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

network_id.title: Nonce
network_id.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

confirmation_timestamp.title: Confirmation timestamp
confirmation_timestamp.description: The time when the block was confirmed.

gas_used.title: Gas used
gas_used.description: The gas amount used executing transaction.

gas_refunded.title: Gas refunded
gas_refunded.description: The amount that is refunded in special cases.

new_address.title: New address
new_address.description: New address that is created after executing transaction (deployed contract address). Zero address if no contract was created.

output.title: Output
output.description: The returned data of the call, e.g. a smart contract functions return value.

excepted.title: Excepted
excepted.description: True if an exception happened, false if transaction execution was successful.

methods.name: tol_getTransactionList
methods.description: Retrieves most recent transaction list based on transaction limit and how many transactions to skip.

params.name: addresses
params.description: List of all addresses by which transaction should be filtered (leave empty to apply no filter and return all transactions).

items.title: Hex encoded address
items.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

params.name: limit
params.description: Maximum number of transactions to return in one batch (no more than 1000).

params.name: skip
params.description: Number of most recent transactions to skip starting from blockchains last confirmed block.

result.name: Transactions
result.description: Requested transactions.

block_hash.title: Block hash
block_hash.description: Hash of block where this transaction is found.

transaction_index.title: Transaction index
transaction_index.description: Index of transaction inside a block.

gas.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) to spend to send this transaction (gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts).

gas_price.title: Gas price
gas_price.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas, greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

data.description: Smart contract bytecode. Not in hex format, transform hex bytecode to bytes.

nonce.title: Nonce
nonce.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

network_id.title: Nonce
network_id.description: Unique transaction index for particular sender (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

confirmation_timestamp.description: The time when the block was confirmed.

new_address.description: New address that is created after executing transaction (deployed contract address). Zero address if no contract was created.

methods.name: tol_getPastEvents
methods.description: Returns emitted events by the contract.

params.name: address
params.description: Address of the contract.

schema.title: Hex encoded address
schema.description: Hex encoded address 50 digits long. Must start with 54 (ASCII for letter T).

params.name: topic
params.description: Keccak256 of the event name and arguments.

result.name: Past events
result.description: Contracts emitted events.

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Keccak256 of the event name and arguments.

block_index.title: Block index
block_index.description: Unique sequential auto incremented block id.

methods.name: net_peerCount
methods.description: Get current peer count in running HashNet network.

methods.name: net_masterNodeCount
methods.description: Get current master nodes count in running HashNet network.

methods.description: Check if this service is tolar HashNet master node.
